title: spice chicken with ginger and garlic
description: ‘Panch phoron’ is an Indian five-spice mixture, typically of fenugreek seed, nigella seed, cumin seed, black mustard seed and fennel seed. It adds wonderful depth in this easy chicken curry recipe.
ingredients: 3 tsp five-spice mixture (panch phoran: fenugreek seed, nigella seed, cumin seed, black mustard seed and fennel seed)
plain boiled rice or chapati, to serve
